mapper.select: SELECT ANY_VALUE(research_field) AS research_field, ROUND(SUM(pzje),2) AS expenditure, COUNT(*) AS project FROM ( SELECT ANY_VALUE(jgbh) AS jgbh, ANY_VALUE(jgmc) AS jgmc, SUM(pzje) AS pzje FROM temp_cas_staff_for_rencaicount AS a INNER JOIN ( SELECT xmpzh, xmfzr, ytdw, pzje FROM cas_icp_isisn_nsfc_projects WHERE pznd=${endYear} ) AS b ON a.xm=b.xmfzr AND a.jgmc=b.ytdw GROUP BY jgbh ) AS c INNER JOIN ( SELECT field_id, research_field, jgbh, jgmc FROM relation_field_affiliation WHERE user_id = "${userId}" AND field_id ${arrayStr} ) AS d ON c.jgbh=d.jgbh GROUP BY research_field;

SELECT ANY_VALUE(research_field) AS research_field, ANY_VALUE(zwmc) AS zwmc, COUNT(a.id) AS rs FROM temp_cas_staff_for_rencaicount AS a INNER JOIN ( SELECT field_id, research_field, jgbh, jgmc FROM relation_field_affiliation WHERE user_id = "${userId}" AND field_id ${arrayStr} ) AS b ON a.jgbh=b.jgbh GROUP BY research_field, zwmc;

SELECT ANY_VALUE(research_field) AS research_field, IFNULL(ANY_VALUE(xw),"未知") AS xw, COUNT(a.id) AS rs FROM temp_cas_staff_for_rencaicount AS a INNER JOIN ( SELECT field_id, research_field, jgbh, jgmc FROM relation_field_affiliation WHERE user_id = "${userId}" AND field_id ${arrayStr} ) AS b ON a.jgbh=b.jgbh GROUP BY research_field, xw

SELECT d.jgbh, d.jgmc, ROUND(pzje,2) AS expenditure, project FROM ( SELECT ANY_VALUE(jgbh) AS jgbh, ANY_VALUE(jgmc) AS jgmc, SUM(pzje) AS pzje, COUNT(*) AS project FROM temp_cas_staff_for_rencaicount AS a INNER JOIN ( SELECT xmpzh, xmfzr, ytdw, pzje FROM cas_icp_isisn_nsfc_projects WHERE pznd=${endYear} ) AS b ON a.xm=b.xmfzr AND a.jgmc=b.ytdw GROUP BY jgbh ) AS c INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT jgbh, jgmc FROM relation_field_affiliation WHERE user_id = "${userId}" AND jgbh ${arrayStr} ) AS d ON c.jgbh=d.jgbh;

SELECT ANY_VALUE(a.jgbh) AS jgbh, ANY_VALUE(b.jgmc) AS jgmc, ANY_VALUE(zwmc) AS zwmc, COUNT(a.id) AS rs FROM temp_cas_staff_for_rencaicount AS a INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT jgbh, jgmc FROM relation_field_affiliation WHERE user_id = "${userId}" AND jgbh ${arrayStr} ) AS b ON a.jgbh=b.jgbh GROUP BY b.jgbh, b.jgmc, zwmc

SELECT ANY_VALUE(a.jgbh) AS jgbh, ANY_VALUE(b.jgmc) AS jgmc, IFNULL(ANY_VALUE(xw),"未知") AS xw, COUNT(a.id) AS rs FROM temp_cas_staff_for_rencaicount AS a INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT jgbh, jgmc FROM relation_field_affiliation WHERE user_id = "${userId}" AND jgbh ${arrayStr} ) AS b ON a.jgbh=b.jgbh GROUP BY a.jgbh, a.jgmc, xw
